data.title: Spaces for Designers
data.description: As a small startup trying to figure out product market fit ourself, we’ve created The Founders Club so we could be amongst cool people building sustainable businesses on bitcoin to learn from.

links.description: Every few months we’ll be having missions for members of the founders club.
